name: C. Tea Party
statement:
Polycarp invited all his friends to the tea party to celebrate the
holiday. He has cups, one for each of his friends, with volumes . His
teapot stores milliliters of tea (). Polycarp wants to pour tea in cups
in such a way that: Every cup will contain tea for at least half of its
volume Every cup will contain integer number of milliliters of tea All
the tea from the teapot will be poured into cups All friends will be .
Friend with cup won’t be , if there exists such cup that cup contains
less tea than cup but .For each cup output how many milliliters of tea
should be poured in it. If it’s impossible to pour all the tea and
satisfy all conditions then output .
